--------------------
Text: Jan van Steffeswert or alternatively Jan van Steffenswort or Jan van Stevensweert (born c. 1460 - died c. 1531) was a Flemish sculptor and woodcarver based in Maastricht.

Triplets:
<Jan van Steffeswert
1:
--------------------
Text: Jan van Steffeswert:  Contrary to the customs of the time, he signed almost all the works he produced using variously Jan Bieldesnider, Jan van Weerd or Jan van Steffeswert.
Triplets:<Jan van Steffeswert
2:
--------------------
Text: Jan van Steffeswert:  To date, fourteen works have been positively identified as his.
Triplets:<Jan van Steffeswert
